amendment.description: Amendment sought to require oil companies applying for permits to disclose, as part of their application, data on oil subsidies provided to the company by the Federal Government.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 112-111 to require all permit applications to include data on federal oil subsidies received by the company applying for the permit.
